description:
'''Raga Rockers''' is a [[Norway|Norwegian]] rock band. The band was formed in 1982 in [[Oslo]] by vocalist Michael Krohn, bassist Livio Aiello, guitarist Bruno Hovden and drummer Jan Arne Kristiansen. Raga Rocker's musical style has evolved throughout the years and is often characterized as melodic rock with dark and satirical lyrics. The band's current lineup comprises founding members Krohn, Aiello and Kristiansen, guitarists Eivind Staxsrud and Henning Sandsdalen, and keyboardist Arne SÃ¦ther. 

Raga Rockers is considered one of the "big four" Norwegian bands who popularized modern rock with Norwegian lyrics in the 1980s alongside [[Jokke & Valentinerne]], [[DeLillos]] and [[DumDum Boys]]. The band has released twelve studio albums, four live albums and two compilation albums.
